title: Bullfrog
data:
***Version [0.28](/0.28 "0.28")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all amphibians, see [List of reptiles and amphibians](/List_of_reptiles_and_amphibians "List of reptiles and amphibians").*

| bullfrog F [![Bullfrog.png](/images/d/da/Bullfrog.png)](/File:Bullfrog.png) |                                                                                  |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                              | 14-30                                                                            |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                  | 4                                                                                |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                              | 90                                                                               |
| [Speed](/Monster_speed "Monster speed")                                     | 15 (swim: 60%)                                                                   |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                          | 0                                                                                |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                    | 12                                                                               |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                              | 20                                                                               |
| Attack1                                                                     | 9 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour")) |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                     | [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation")                                           |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                           | None                                                                             |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                               | Amphibious                                                                       |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                | [Animal](/Category:Animal_intelligence "Category:Animal intelligence")           |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                            | [Uses nothing](/Category:Uses_nothing "Category:Uses nothing")                   |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                            | [Natural](/Category:Natural_holiness "Category:Natural holiness")                |
| [Size](/Size "Size")                                                        | [Medium](/Category:Medium_monsters "Category:Medium monsters")                   |
| [Type](/Type "Type")                                                        | frog, bullfrog                                                                   |
| Flags                                                                       | [Cold-blooded](/Blood_temperature "Blood temperature")                           |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A large and unusually aggressive amphibian that can cover distance rapidly by hopping.***“Hello, my baby Hello, my honey Hello, my ragtime gal Send me a kiss by wire Baby, my hearts on fire If you refuse me Honey, you’ll lose me Then you’ll be left alone Oh baby, telephone And tell me I’m your own.” -Ida Emerson and Joseph E. Howard, “Hello My Baby!” |

## Useful Info

**Bullfrogs** are fast-moving [amphibians](/List_of_reptiles_and_amphibians "List of reptiles and amphibians") that have meager offensive abilities, but which can be a threat to very low-level characters. They are usually found in the early-mid [Dungeon](/Dungeon "Dungeon") and [the Lair](/The_Lair "The Lair"), but can appear as [out-of-depth](/Out-of-depth "Out-of-depth") foes very early, or at the end of the [Sewers](/Sewers "Sewers").

## Tips & Tricks

A bullfrog's speed makes escaping them difficult, particularly when they're encountered in water. If you know you can't outrun them to a [staircase](/Stair "Stair") or [door](/Door "Door") that you can close, spend your actions hitting them with [throwing](/Throwing "Throwing") weapons or [wands](/Wand "Wand"). Simply running won't accomplish anything.

In the Sewers, a [wand of flame](/Wand_of_flame "Wand of flame") will create [steam](/Steam "Steam") clouds above [water](/Water "Water"), which should be enough to handle the bullfrogs there. Any other wand can work, as well.

## History

Prior to version [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), bullfrogs were known as **giant frogs**.
html:
Bullfrog

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all amphibians, see List of reptiles and amphibians.

bullfrog F 
HP 14-30
HD 4
XP 90
Speed 15 (swim: 60%)
AC 0
EV 12
Will 20
Attack1 9 (hit: plain)


Resistances rDrown
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Amphibious
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type frog, bullfrog
Flags Cold-blooded
A large and unusually aggressive amphibian that can cover distance rapidly by hopping.

“Hello, my baby
Hello, my honey
Hello, my ragtime gal

Send me a kiss by wire
Baby, my hearts on fire

If you refuse me
Honey, you’ll lose me
Then you’ll be left alone

Oh baby, telephone
And tell me I’m your own.”
-Ida Emerson and Joseph E. Howard, “Hello My Baby!”

Useful Info

Bullfrogs are fast-moving amphibians that have meager offensive abilities, but which can be a threat to very low-level characters. They are usually found in the early-mid Dungeon and the Lair, but can appear as out-of-depth foes very early, or at the end of the Sewers.

Tips & Tricks

A bullfrog's speed makes escaping them difficult, particularly when they're encountered in water. If you know you can't outrun them to a staircase or door that you can close, spend your actions hitting them with throwing weapons or wands. Simply running won't accomplish anything.

In the Sewers, a wand of flame will create steam clouds above water, which should be enough to handle the bullfrogs there. Any other wand can work, as well.

History

Prior to version 0.19, bullfrogs were known as giant frogs.

Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Bullfrog&oldid=59351"

rawPage:
{{version028}}
''For a list of all amphibians, see [[List of reptiles and amphibians]].''
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Bullfrogs''' are fast-moving [[list of reptiles and amphibians|amphibians]] that have meager offensive abilities, but which can be a threat to very low-level characters. They are usually found in the early-mid [[Dungeon]] and [[the Lair]], but can appear as [[out-of-depth]] foes very early, or at the end of the [[Sewers]].

==Tips & Tricks==
A bullfrog's speed makes escaping them difficult, particularly when they're encountered in water. If you know you can't outrun them to a [[stair]]case or [[door]] that you can close, spend your actions hitting them with [[throwing]] weapons or [[wand]]s. Simply running won't accomplish anything.

In the Sewers, a [[wand of flame]] will create [[steam]] clouds above [[water]], which should be enough to handle the bullfrogs there. Any other wand can work, as well.

==History==
Prior to version [[0.19]], bullfrogs were known as '''giant frogs'''.
